position.marginalia_text: Qualis ho[min]i vita in [terris] esse debet.

marginalia.translation: The life of what kind of man ougt to be on earth.

position.marginalia_text: Os homini sublime dedit, co[e]lumq[ue] vivere iussit

marginalia.translation: From high above the mouth gave to men, and ordered him to watch the sky.

underline.text: ut demersus animus, & pessundatus, nunq[uam] originis suae possit inuenire principia, sed in tenebris semper, in coenóq[ue]
ut recti corporis forma, ab omni
rectum & incoruptum immortalitatis iter, ad originem suam reuersurus, inueniat, nec errantibus gressibus, & labentibus, trepidantibúsq[ue]
